attributes.action: Reduce and regulate Council car parking charges.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Councils the length and breadth of the country are capitalising on our poor public transport infrastructure and the limited availability of parking, by charging huge hourly & daily parking tariff's for roadside and Local Authority parking in our towns & cities. This needs regulation with a reasonable maximum daily tariff applied

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
